links.title: Millennium Group International Holdings Announces Strategic Actions to Enhance Operational Efficiency And Cost Reduction
links.content:
[Skip to main content](#maincontent)

[![Millennium Group](//s202.q4cdn.com/428893874/files/design/logo2.png)](https://www.millennium-gp.com/)

# News Details

[View All News](https://investors.millennium-gp.com/news/default.aspx)

###  Millennium Group International Holdings Announces Strategic Actions to Enhance Operational Efficiency And Cost Reduction

May 2, 2024

_Streamlining Operations and Maximizing Margins through the Consolidation and Wind-Down of Yee Woo Paper Industry (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd._

**HONG KONG, May 02, 2024** – Millennium Group International Holdings Limited (Nasdaq: MGIH) (the "Company" or "Millennium"), a well-established supplier of paper-based packaging solutions, announced the initiation of strategic actions, including the voluntary liquidation of Yee Woo Paper Industry (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. ("YWSZ") and consolidating part of the YWSZ operations into Millennium Printing (Shenzhen) Company Ltd. (“MPSZ”). This effort is expected to optimize the Company’s production footprint, enhance efficiency and reduce costs. 

As a Shenzhen, China-based subsidiary company of Millennium, YWSZ specialized in manufacturing corrugated paperboard and flexographic paper packaging boxes. However, YWSZ’s business performance has significantly declined since the beginning of 2023 due to various factors, including the ongoing SinoUS trade tension, the lingering effects of the pandemic, rising shipment costs exacerbated by geopolitical conflicts, and overall economic conditions. 

As a result of these challenges, the Company's management has decided to consolidate a portion of YWSZ’s operations into MPSZ by installing similar manufacturing production lines. This consolidation, along with the simultaneous voluntary liquidation of YWSZ, aims to maximize the Company’s production efficiency and minimize production costs. 

Ray Lai, Chief Executive Officer of Millennium, expressed confidence in this strategic initiative, stating, “Our decision to consolidate YWSZ aligns with our commitment to efficiency and profitability. Through the consolidation of operations into MPSZ, we are poised to elevate our production capabilities while simultaneously driving down costs, thereby improving our profit margins and securing an even more dominant competitive edge in the paper packaging market." 

“In the face of dynamic economic landscapes, we recognize the imperative to optimize our operations for sustainable growth. Our strategic decision underscores our dedication to prudent management and longterm value creation,” said Matthew Lai, Chairman of Millennium. “By streamlining our manufacturing footprint and minimizing fixed costs and overhead, we position Millennium for greater profitability and flexibility, ensuring we remain agile and adaptive in a dynamic business environment." 

The liquidation process is expected to take another six to nine months to complete, with estimated costs ranging from USD$4.9 million to USD$6.5 million, covering redundancy expenses, compensation, and losses from disposing of fixed assets, raw materials, and inventories. Further details on these costs will be disclosed in a future amendment to the Current Report on Form 6-K filed on April 25, 2024. 

**About Millennium Group International Holdings Limited**

Founded in 1978, Millennium Group is a long-established paper-based packaging solutions supplier committed to providing creative and sustainable packaging solutions to worldwide brands. The Company manufactures packaging products and corrugated products, and provides packaging products supply chain management solutions for a wide range of industries. Headquartered in Hong Kong with operations in the PRC and Vietnam, the Company adopts a one-stop integrated service approach with an objective to cover the entire value chain of its customers, with the sales of its products to PRC, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Myanmar, Australia, Indonesia, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, United States, India and Germany. For more information, please visit the Company's website: [ https://www.millennium-gp.com/ ](https://www.millennium-gp.com/)

links.title: Millennium Group International Holdings Attends CES 2024 in Las Vegas
links.content:
[Skip to main content](#maincontent)

[![Millennium Group](//s202.q4cdn.com/428893874/files/design/logo2.png)](https://www.millennium-gp.com/)

# News Details

[View All News](https://investors.millennium-gp.com/news/default.aspx)

###  Millennium Group International Holdings Attends CES 2024 in Las Vegas

February 23, 2024

_The Company debuts at CES with innovative packaging products and one-stop supply chain solutions_

**HONG KONG, February 20, 2024** – Millennium Group International Holdings Limited (Nasdaq: MGIH) (the "Company" or "Millennium"), a well-established supplier of paper-based packaging solutions, has announced that its executives and sales teams attended CES 2024 in Las Vegas, Nevada, held from January 9-12, 2024. The event provided Millennium with a platform to present its latest innovations in packaging solutions, with a focus on technological advancement, environmental sustainability, and the Company's strategies to expand into the U.S. market by offering packaging designed for technology products. 

![Millennium Manufacturing Asia Awards 01](//s202.q4cdn.com/428893874/files/doc_news/2024/02/MillenniuM-CES.png)

Matthew Lai (middle) and Ray Lai (second from the left) 

lead the Millennium team to attend the CES 2024 

At CES, Millennium aroused the interest of attendees by showcasing its state-of-the-art packaging solutions specifically for audio-visual products, smart home devices, and mobile phones. These solutions not only showed technological prowess but also underscored Millennium's unwavering commitment to environmental sustainability. 

A highlight of Millennium's presence at CES was the introduction of its comprehensive, one-stop supply chain solutions to consumer technology customers. Recognizing the importance of offering seamless services and added value to customers, the Company showcased its end-to-end supply chain capabilities. By integrating various stages of the supply chain, Millennium aims to streamline processes, enhance efficiency, and improve customer satisfaction. 

The overwhelmingly positive response from prominent technology companies and the continued interest from new customers, partners, and suppliers at the event underscored the success of the Company’s endeavors. 

Ray Lai, Chief Executive Officer of Millennium, commented, "Being a part of CES gave us the opportunity to showcase our successful premium packages designed for the Hi-Tech industry. We have a strong track record in providing packaging solutions for various consumer electronics brands. Our R&D team continues to explore advanced technologies, such as RFID (Radio Frequency Identification technology) and NFC (Near Field Communication), to improve communication within our smart packaging. This will enhance the ability to capture product data, track packages, provide real-time updates, and manage inventory more efficiently. Ultimately, it will greatly benefit our customers by improving the flow of their logistics operations." 

Matthew Lai, Chairman of Millennium, further emphasized the significance of the Company's participation at CES, saying, "Our decision to exhibit our products at CES aligns with our long-term strategic vision of becoming a global industry leader in paper packaging solutions. Our unique one-stop supply chain solutions demonstrate our commitment to delivering exceptional value and convenient services to our customers worldwide. As we continue to focus on creativity, technical advancements, sustainability, and new market developments, Millennium will be well-positioned to thrive in a dynamic industry landscape." 

**About Millennium Group International Holdings Limited**

Founded in 1978, Millennium Group is a long-established paper-based packaging solutions supplier committed to providing creative and sustainable packaging solutions to worldwide brands. The Company manufactures packaging products and corrugated products, and provides packaging products supply chain management solutions for a wide range of industries. Headquartered in Hong Kong with operations in the PRC and Vietnam, the Company adopts a one-stop integrated service approach with an objective to cover the entire value chain of its customers, with the sales of its products to PRC, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Myanmar, Australia, Indonesia, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, United States, India and Germany. For more information, please visit the Company's website: [ https://www.millennium-gp.com/ ](https://www.millennium-gp.com/)
